alert.note: Alert for Greene; Morgan (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 26 at 12:14PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Morgan and central Greene Counties through 1245 PM EDT... At 1214 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Harmony, or 8 miles south of Madison, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Greensboro, Union Point, Woodville, White Plains, Siloam, Buckhead, Veazey, Parks Mill, Carey, Swords, Penfield and Godfrey. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
